title: 446: No Such Thing As A Ninja Wearing Clogs
content:
Live from Glasgow, Dan, James, Anna and Andy discuss spiders in space, chickens in clogs, and famous physicists in films. 

Visit nosuchthingasafish.com for news about live shows, merchandise and more episodes.
